content.question: According to the passage, in which of the following ways does the father show concern for his son?

choices.label: He tried to make his son more comfortable.
He enters his son’s bedroom to check on him.
He reminds his wife that their son should rest.

content.answer: He enters his son’s bedroom to check on him.
